title: CF Officers: Advisory Board
author: ebullient
content:
### Proposal

I would like to nominate @ashni-mehta to help run our Advisory Board. Ashni helped set up our initial structure while at MongoDB. She has moved on from that role, and I would love to have her help with vendor outreach in 2025.

### Voting group

@commonhaus/cf-council

### Consensus mechanism

Please use emoji reactions to indicate your support:
- **ğŸ‘ (:+1:)** if it looks good to you
- **ğŸ‘€ (:eyes:)** if you're "ok" with it (it may not be your favorite)
- **ğŸ‘ (:-1:)** if you think this needs discussion first

Ask questions or raise concerns in comments.


### Vote counting instructions

Marthas
